subject: Logic
title: The 16 Binary Logic Operations
description: Binary logic gates are the building blocks of digital circuits. They are used to perform binary operations on binary numbers. There are 16 possible binary logic operations. This lesson introduces the 16 binary logic operations and explains the meaning of a binary operation.
objectives: Understand the meaning of a binary operation
Understand the meaning of a binary logic operation
Understand the meaning of a commutative binary logic operation
